Ruins of the Forgotten: A Wild Survival

name: Ruins of the Forgotten: A Wild Survival
storyline:
In this game, you will play as a Forest Ranger who is lost in a jungle transformed by a strange happening during an animal tagging mission. During the night, due to some mystical energy, all animals are turning dangerous. This is a survival game where you have to take care of your thirst, hunger, and health.

Your Goal
You have to survive the jungle, find ruins and emeralds ("Manis") which are linked with this anamoly and solve the mystery. Build your base strong, take help from animals. Survive the jungle and find the ruins. Defeat big enemies gain emeralds.
summary: "Ruins of the Forgotten" is more than survival; it's a story where choices shape your destiny. Conquer the jungle, reveal secrets, and leave a legacy in mysterious ruins.
